topic.title: Monster Girl Comics and Pictures
topic.body:
This is a torrent that includes the English translation of "Every Day With Monster Girl" chapters 1 through 44.

It also includes the short series "Living with Monster Girl"

There is the Kenkou Cross Monster Girl Bestiary volume 1 and 2 along with several other side projects and fan work. 

There is also several translated and untranslated comics that involve Monster Girls and a folder filled with art from other people that do not fill the criteria as fan art.
